messages.message: @mfichman feel free to drop comments here as well. would be good for visibility

OK! Here is what I suggested to him:

> Hey! I know the SonarQube PR integration is a work in progress, so you may already be aware of these things. But I noticed a few issues:
> 
> (1) We should turn off "duplicate code detection" for test files. Test files are necessarily duplicative in many cases. It's often clearer to repeat yourself in tests rather than over-abstract to avoid repetition; it makes the tests more independent and easier to debug. Example:
> 
> (2) A lot of generated files are getting scanned. In particular, proto:
> 
> (3) Code coverage isn't working (for Go at least):
> 
> Anyway, thanks for working on this! I think it will really help.
